text: He priya nabi! Yakhana bisbasini narira tomara kache ase tomara nikata anugatyera sapatha ka’re ye tara allah‌ra sange kono kichu sarika karabe na, ara curi karabe na, ara byabhicara karabe na, ara tadera santanadera tara hatya karabe na, ara tara emana kono mithya kalanka ratana karabe na ya tadera hatera o tadera payera madhye tara udbhabana kare, ara satkaje tara tomara abadhyata karabe na, -- temana ksetre tadera anugatya grahana karo ebam allah‌ra kache tadera jan'ya paritrana khumjo. Nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
